titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 76 Brookside Avenue in Chester, New York, as the "1st Lieutenant Louis Allen Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
5/6/2008--Introduced.
Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 76 Brookside Avenue in Chester, New York, as the "1st Lieutenant Louis Allen Post Office."
